home.pushTestDesc: Press the button to check if push notifications are working.
home.exploreDesc: Tap on the Messages or Profile tabs at the bottom to explore more features.

auth.title: Phone Verification
auth.phoneNumberError: Please enter a valid phone number (01X-XXXX-XXXX)

profile.title: Profile
profile.paymentNotice: * In the actual service, you can change your nickname after payment.
profile.imageChangeInstructions: Select an image from your gallery to change your profile image.

messages.title: Messages
messages.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this conversation?
messages.noMessagesDescription: You don't have any conversations yet. Start chatting with other users.
messages.noFavoritesDescription: Add important conversations to favorites and they will appear here.
messages.noSearchResultsDescription: Try again with a different search term.
messages.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this conversation? This action cannot be undone.

broadcast.title: Broadcasts
broadcast.recordingLimit: You can record up to 30 seconds.
broadcast.recordingInstructions: Press the record button to start broadcasting.
broadcast.recordingInfo: You can record up to 30 seconds, review your recording, and then send it.
broadcast.audioSetupError: An error occurred during audio setup.
broadcast.permissionError: An error occurred while requesting permissions.
broadcast.playError: An error occurred during audio playback.
broadcast.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this broadcast?

settings.title: Settings
settings.notificationsDescription: Receive notifications for new broadcasts, replies, and other important updates.
settings.newMessageReceiveDescription: Set whether to receive new messages. If disabled, you will not receive new messages.
settings.messageAlarmDescription: Set whether to receive notifications when new messages arrive.
settings.accountSettingsDescription: Manage your personal information and security settings.
settings.dataUsageChanged: Data usage setting has been changed
settings.dataUsageLowDescription: Lower image and audio quality but saves data.
settings.dataUsageMediumDescription: Balanced image and audio quality with moderate data usage.
settings.dataUsageHighDescription: Highest quality images and audio but increases data usage.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.allMarkedAsRead: All notifications have been marked as read.
notifications.markAllError: Failed to mark all notifications as read.
notifications.quietHoursDescription: Do not receive notifications during specified hours.
notifications.broadcastNotificationsDescription: Receive notifications when new broadcasts are posted.
notifications.commentNotificationsDescription: Receive notifications when someone comments on your broadcasts.
notifications.likeNotificationsDescription: Receive notifications when someone likes your broadcasts.
notifications.mentionNotificationsDescription: Receive notifications when someone mentions you.
notifications.systemNotificationsDescription: Receive notifications about app updates and important announcements.
notifications.marketingNotificationsDescription: Receive notifications about promotions and marketing information.

account.title: Account Settings
account.twoFactorAuthDescription: Require an additional authentication step when logging in to enhance account security.
account.deleteAccountConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone and all your data will be permanently deleted.
account.deleteAccountSuccessMessage: Your account has been successfully deleted. Thank you for using our service.
account.deleteAccountError: An error occurred while deleting your account. Please try again later.

feedback.title: Feedback to Operators
feedback.description: Please let us know about any issues or improvement ideas you've found while using the app. Your valuable feedback helps us create a better service.
feedback.submitSuccess: Your feedback has been successfully submitted. Thank you for your valuable opinion.
feedback.submitError: Failed to submit feedback. Please try again.
feedback.note: * The submitted content will only be used for service improvement, and we may respond to your registered contact information if necessary.
